page.title: 05Medical Care in Braintree
page.content: Braintree is the centre for this area, residents from Bocking and Rayne having to travel into the town for treatment. The area boasts good cover for Doctors and Dental surgeries but one must realise that these facilities found in the centre of town have to deal with the population of the surrounding villages. This therefore reduces the overall care slightly. Hospitals are present with both Julian Coutauld and Saint Michaels. Outside this area is Black Notley Hospital. All three of these are small non casualty departments often staffed by the local doctors. The nearest casualty department is to be found at Broomfield Hospital near Chelmsford.
